meanings.definition: A charge of wrongdoing or fault.
meanings.sent1: The accusation against him was serious.
meanings.sent2: She made an accusation of theft against her coworker.
meanings.sent3: The accusation of eating all the cookies was met with laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her accusation of laziness hit him like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The accusation hung over him like a dark cloud.

meanings.sent1: His accusation caused a stir in the office.
meanings.sent2: The accusation led to a heated argument.
meanings.sent3: The accusation of snoring during the meeting was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her accusation of cheating echoed in the room.
meanings.sent5: The accusation rang in his ears long after the meeting ended.
